scripts.build:
mkdir -p out && browserify $(find src/ -name '*.ts' ! -name '*_test.ts' | tr -s '
' ' ') -p tsify --outfile out.js --verbose && vulcanize --inline-scripts --exclude bower_components/webcomponentsjs/ --inline-css app.html | crisper --html out/index.html --js out/index.js && mv out/index.js out/index.tmp.js && babel out/index.tmp.js | uglifyjs -c -m -r 'customElements,Polymer' -o out/index.js && rm out/index.tmp.js && cp -r bower_components/ out/
